presenting.title: Presentation
personhood_desc: Personhood.online is an experimental application that is used to try out new ideas
for identity management and troll-resistance. It is based on research from the DEDIS
lab at EPFL and actively developed by Linus Gasser. The current version should run
without too many bugs and its goal is to start a discussion of what is possible.
presenting.personhood_link: Personhood is brought to you by
identity_desc: Please fill in an alias with which the other users will recognize you later. You can also change it
after you started using the system.
identity_desc_full: Let's start with getting to know you. The only required field is 'alias', but for more functionality,
you should also fill out the email, the phone-number, and give an URL. Of course you can also do so later.
All of this information will eventually be public on our servers.
asis: This software is given as-is. More specifically: all of your data is stored in clear on our blockchain.
Calls are done unprotected. Poplets will disappear. Feel free to open issues on
congrats: Congratulations, you're all set up to go. As is, you are not connected to any of our services.
But you can go around and meet other people who have the app and exchange your identity with them.
This will also start to create your social graph.
parties: You can also visit personhood-parties. They will prove that you're a unique person, and will allow you
to sign up to our experimental blockchain. Once you signed up, your identity can be updated automatically
by all your contacts, if you give them the permission.
next_steps: Once you're signed up you can play a game of rock-paper-scissors on the blockchain.
If you participate in a personhood party, you can create an anonymous, troll-resistant poll.

home.title: Hello %s
home.register: To register, ask someone to invite you and scan this QR Code, or go to a personhood-party.
home.nosnack: Not enough poplets left to pay a snack, sorry!
home.snack: Do you want to pay a snack for 60 poplets?
home.no_admin: Only an organizer can pay you a snack
home.snack_paid: Thanks for paying your snack. Show this message to the organizer to get your snack.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.join_msg: By joining the challenge you reveal your progress for anybody to see. Do you agree?

settings.title: Settings
settings.clear_confirm_1: Do you really want to delete everything? There is no way back!
settings.clear_confirm_2: You will lose all your data! No way back!
settings.data_deleted: ALL YOUR DATA HAS BEEN DELETED!

score.title: Personhood
desc: Your achievement represents how much of the app you already explored. The higher the score, the more
score.attributes_improve: Add more information to your identity.
score.registrations_improve: Get yourself registered on the blockchain by asking someone to invite you, or visit a personhood party.
score.registrations_done: Nice. Enjoy staying on the blockchain!
score.meetups_improve: Meet some people and exchange contacts. Only unique meeting groups are counted.
score.parties_improve: Go to a personhood party and get your public key registered.
score.polls_improve: Answer polls to raise your achievements.
score.snack_improve: Buy a snack to recover from your efforts.
score.snack_done: I hope the snack was good!
score.invites_improve: Invite and sign up new players.

personhood.title: Manage Badges and Parties

contact_info.title: Show Contact
contact_info.instructions: Click on the attributes to call, send email or open url.

ropascis.title: Play Rock Paper Scissors
ropascis.need_registration: You need to be registered on the blockchain before being able to play
ropascis.no_calypso: You chose not to use calypso - this will make the game more difficult. Are you sure?

add_ropascis.title: Configuration
description: The total cost of the game also includes the cost of saving it to the blockchain, which is 0.101
poplets. The first player needs to spend the stake + 0.101, while the second player only needs to pay the stake.
The winner receives all the stake, while the loser doesn't receive anything. In case of a draw, the system takes

polls.title: Answer polls anonymously
polls.missing_badge: Before you can answer any polls, you need to get a personhood-badge
